name: Tinster
description: ``` docker run -d --name tinster -p 27017:27017 mongo:latest (docker start tinster) docker exec -it tinster bash ```

scripts.start: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "Docker,Server,Client" -c "bold,bold,bold" --kill-others-on-fail "docker start tinster" "cd server && nodemon index.js" "cd client && npm start"
